blocks.title: a HOLIDAY HOME  blending WATERFRONT SERENITY with CONTEMPORARY LUXURY
blocks.description: Meher Sra Designs envisioned this holiday residence as a refined sanctuary set against the backdrop of the waterfront. The design intent was to create a home that offered both the ease of leisure and the sophistication of modern living — a retreat that feels serene yet unmistakably cosmopolitan.Expansive windows frame panoramic views, filling the interiors with natural light and a sense of openness. Bespoke furniture, curated finishes, and layered textures bring warmth to the contemporary layout, while subtle detailing ensures every element feels intentional and elegant.
